title: is Yasuo's passive being changed to something akin to IE's old passive? More damage on crits?
body: Given the recent shift of his passive to an actual item (New IE); I thought him having a "does MORE damage with crits" passive would be an interesting change-up.

replies.body: Probably. I don't know how that would work out though.

it prob wouldn't be fair since he already gets true damage every auto from just 2 items. (atk speed item + IE)
